from seed and these ones we've started in the outdoor kitchen and soil blocks they're doing awesome and the potatoes are looking good I'm excited for the cabbage it seems to be doing pretty good red cabbage and then the green cabbage is on this side and I'm not seeing any green cabbage I wonder how long it'll be before we start picking some string beans you're crazy picked you really still
